name: va99
description: Tiny audio manager for BGM and SE in browser
author: ayamada

scripts.make: npm run make-min-js && npm run make-min-mjs
scripts.make-min-js:
google-closure-compiler --js html/va99.js --externs html/va99.externs.js --js_output_file html/va99.min.js --create_source_map html/va99.min.js.map --source_map_location_mapping 'html/|' --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --assume_function_wrapper --language_in ECMASCRIPT_2021 --language_out ECMASCRIPT_2021 --output_wrapper '%output%
//# sourceMappingURL=va99.min.js.map'
scripts.make-min-mjs:
google-closure-compiler --js html/va99.js --externs html/va99.externs.js --js_output_file html/va99.min.mjs --create_source_map html/va99.min.mjs.map --source_map_location_mapping 'html/|' --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --assume_function_wrapper --allow_dynamic_import --language_in ECMASCRIPT_2021 --language_out ECMASCRIPT_2021 --output_wrapper 'export let %output%
//# sourceMappingURL=va99.min.mjs.map'
